data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Madaripur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Madaripur, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Madaripur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Madaripur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Madaripur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kaora people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, let it be said of the 1,164,539 lost in Madaripur that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Madaripur with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,461 believers in Madaripur and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

location.name: Madaripur
location.people_groups_list: Patni (Muslim traditions), Abdul, Maulangi, Khandait, Namassej (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Patni (Muslim traditions) (6,000), Abdul (27,000), Maulangi (500), Khandait (1,700), Namassej (Muslim traditions) (1,500)
